conversion_verification.notes: Successful isometric cutaway conversion with clear volumetric representation.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with accurate wall corners and depth. High scores for viewing angle and clean cutaway.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room configuration and adjacencies are highly accurate. Minor discrepancy in staircase orientation vs 2D plan and some window placement shifts.

interior_elements.notes: All major components (kitchen, bath, living furniture) present and correctly scaled to their respective zones.

visual_clarity.notes: Rendering is clean and lighting is effective. Deductions made for 'ENTRANCE' text label over the door and slight artifacting on the stairs.

detected_errors.description: Staircase treads and directional layout differ slightly from the 2D orthographic plan.
Text label 'ENTRANCE' remains visible on the 3D model geometry.

summary: A highly faithful 3D conversion that maintains architectural integrity and spatial logic with only minor rendering and labeling artifacts.
